long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doodle Jumping for Chrome Extension is an addictive endless jumping game that will take you to unimaginable heights. In this game, your goal is to guide a small green creature named The Doodler through a series of platforms without letting him fall off.

If you enjoy casual games with simple controls and enjoyable gameplay, "Doodle Jumping" is a must-play for you. It captures the addictive essence of the immensely popular mobile game Doodle Jump while introducing new features to enhance the experience. The game is fan-made and faithfully recreates the elements that made the original game so beloved.

With "Doodle Jumping," you can challenge your reflexes and test your skills at any time, making it perfect for short breaks or leisurely gaming sessions. The game is available online, and you can play it for free by visiting the website https://doodlejump.net/. So get ready to embark on an endless jumping adventure and see how high you can reach with "Doodle Jumping"!
